projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

div.p:
driṣṭaM. siddhaM. svast a i nandivarddhanāT. Agni-ṣṭomāptoryyāmokthya-ṣoḍaśy-atirātra-
vājapeya-br̥has y p ati-sava-sādyaskra-catur-aśvamedha-yājinaḥ viṣṇuvr̥ddha-
sagotrasya samrāṭ samrājo vākātakānām mahārāja-śrī-pravarasenasya sūnoḥ sūnoḥ
Atyanta-svāmi-mahā-bhairava-bhaktasya|| asaṁ aṁsa -bhāra-sanniveśita-śiva-liṅgo
dvahana-śiva-suparituṣṭa-samutpādita-rāja-vaṁśānāM parākkramādhigata-bhāgī
ratthy-amala-jala-mūrddhābhiṣiktānāṁ daśāśvamedh-āvabhr̥tha-snātānāṁ bhāraśivānāṁ
mahārāja-śrī-bhavanāga-dauhitrasya gautamiputrasya putrasya| vākāṭa
kānām mahārāja-śrī-rudrasenasya sūnoḥ Atyanta-māheśvarasya||
satyārjjava-kāruṇya-śauryya-vikkrama-naya-vinaya-māhātmya-dhīmatva-
pātra-gata-bhaktitva-dharmma-vijayitva-mano-nairmmalyādi-guṇais samu
petasya|| varṣaśatam-abhivarddhamāna-kośa-daṇḍa-sādhana-santāna-
putrapautriṇaḥ yudhiṣṭhira-vr̥tter vvākāṭakānām mahārāja-śrī-pr̥thivī
se n ṇ asya sūnor-bbhagavataś cakkrapāṇeḫ prasād ā o pārjjita-śrī-samudayasya
mahārāja-śr i ī -rudrasenasya sūnoḥ mahārāj-ādhirāja-śrī-devagupta-
sutāy a ā ṁ prabhāvatīguptāy a ā m utpannasya|| śambhoḫ prasāda-dhr̥t i a -kārtta
-yugasya| vākāṭakānām paramamāheśvara-mahārāja-śrī-pravarasena
sya vacanāt|

supratiṣṭhāh a ā re| umā-nadyā Apara-pārśve| ciṁcāpalyā
Uttare pārśve| bonthika-vāṭakasya| pūrvve pārśve| maṇḍuki-grāmasya
dakṣiṇe pārśve| kothuraka-nnāma-grāmaḥ kauṇḍinya-sagotra| taittirika-gaṇa-yāji
-kāluṭṭaka-brahmacāriṇe datt ā a ḥ. yato smat-santakāḥ sarvvāddhyakṣa-niyoga-niyuktā
Ājñā-saṁcāri-kulaputrādhikr̥tāḥ bhaṭṭāś chātrāś ca vi ṣ śr uta-pūrvvayājñayājñāpayi
tavyā

viditam astu vaḥ yathehāsmābhir ātmano dharmmāyur-bbala-vijayaiśvaryya-vi
vr̥ddhaye ihāmutra-hitārttham ātmānugrahāya vaijayike dharmma-sthāne Apūrvva-da
ttyā udaka-pūrvvam atisr̥ṣṭaḥ. yathāsyopacitāṁ pūrvva-rājānumatāñ cāturvvaidya-
grāma-maryyādā n ṁ vitarāmas. tad yathā A-kara-dāy i ī a-bhaṭa-cch a ā tra-prāveśyaḥ A-pā
rampara-go-bal a i varddaḥ A-puṣpa-kṣīra-sandohaḥ A- v c ārāsana-carmm-āṅgāraḥ A-la
vaṇa-klinna-klenī-khanakaḥ sarvva-v e i ṣṭi-sa-parihāra-parihr̥taḥ sa-nidhiḥ
sopanidhiḥ saklipt-opaklipta Ācandrāditya-kāl i ī yaḥ putrapautrānugā
mikaḥ bhuñjat ā o na kenacid vyāghātayitavyaḥ sarvva-k r̥ ri yābhis-saṁrakṣitavyaḥ
parivarddhayitavyaś c ā a . yaś cāsmac-chāsanam agaṇayamānaḥ svalpām api paribādhāṁ
kuryyāt kārayita kārayeta vā tasya brāhmaṇair vveditasya sa-daṇḍa-nigrahaṁ kuryyāma||
Asmiṁś ca dharmmādara-karaṇe Atītāneka-rāja- dattāṁ datta- sañcintana-paripālanaṁ
kr̥ta-puṇyānukīrttana-parihārārtthaṁ na kīrttayāmaḥ. vyāsa-g i ī taś cātra ślokaḫ pramāṇī-
karttavyaḥ

saṁvatsare dvitīye Aśvayuja-māsa-śukla-dvādaśyāṁ|
cakkradevaḥ dūtakaḥ. nāgavarmmaṇā likhitaM||||
